short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace new tab screen with your focus and motivation

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will open every-time you open a new tab. Its a basic todo list and shows you the time. I hope this app can help you stay focused. 
The first page asks for your name and birthdate to then show you that information on every new tab you open
